summary: WHILE DRIVING AT 55 MPH CONSUMER FELT THAT  VEHICLE STARTED RESPONDING SLUGGISHLY.  AFTER A FEW MILES,  CONSUMER NOTICED FIRE COMING FROM THE DRIVER'S SIDE REAR WHEEL.   VEHICLE WAS COMPLETELY CONSUMED BY THE FIRE.  THERE WERE NO INJURIES.  POLICE AND THE FIRE DEPARTMENT RESPONDED TO THE SCENE.  *AK
